history.text: Hello, what movie should we watch?
Hey! Want to hear about one of my favorite Christmas movies, Home Alone?
Love to, that's a great movie.
Who is in that again?
It stars Macaulay Culkin as the kid that's Home Alone
and Joe Pesci and Daniel Stern as the "bad guys"
ooh right.  He was hilarious in that.  Joe Pesci was awesome as usual.
did you like all of Kevin's pranks?
He certainly comes up with some elaborate booby traps!
I agree.  My favorite is the icy stairwell.  too funny.  when did that movie come out again?
wayyyyy back in 1990!
no kidding!  now i feel old
Me too! I sitll can't believe that they accidentally leave their youngest son behind!
yeah, even though they made everyone look so busy, they really should've did more headcounts before reaching the plance.
whoops, plane i mean.
It's pretty funny. I guess they needed that bit for the movie to happen in the first place!
it does set up the rest of the movie.  of course no one notices except the mom.
haha go figure! It is still a cute and slapstick movie, though! One critic called it a "sadistic festival of adult-bashing". :D
HA!  guess i find adult-bashing to be hilarious.  especially when the bad guys make such funny faces, and they deserve it, robbing people at christmas time.  horrible!
Right? I agree! I had forgotten that the mom DOES try to get back to him, but she ends up getting waylaid at every turn!
I love when she ends up with the travelling polka band
yes, it's pretty funny when she's stuck in that van with some weird band.
Jinx!
LOL.  polka, right!
doesn't she go thru a bunch of stuff only to get home at the same time as the rest of the family?
Yes!
They got a direct flight home after waiting 2 days
What a funny movie that was.  We watch it every christmas.
I haven't watched it in a long time. I think I'll have to again now!
I love how inventive he is. I was like that as a kid too!
luckily I never had to deal with that exact scenario though!
Not me, I think i would've just called some friends and gone to their house till my family came home.
same! Great talking to you!
thanks, bye!

uid2response.feedback: it was a good reminder of a fun movie i'd seen before, and i would like to rent it again at christmas time.
